classes

Class Table

  • java.lang.Object
    • classes.Table
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    I_table

    public class Table
extends java.lang.Object
implements I_table
    Table stands for the physical table/desk where the board and the pieces are. It contains some methods to interact with the board and with not already used pieces
    Author:
    Morettini

      • Table

        public Table(java.lang.String pathBoardFile,
             java.lang.String pathNotUsedPiecesFile)
      throws NotUsedPieceConfigurationException,
             BoardConfigurationException,
             java.io.IOException
        Constructor of the Table class
        Parameters:
        pathBoardFile - file's path which contains board's configuration
        pathNotUsedPiecesFile - file's path which contains the list of not used pieces
        Throws:
        NotUsedPieceConfigurationException - If there are any mistakes inside the Not Used Pieces' file
        BoardConfigurationException - If there are any mistakes inside the Board's file
        java.io.IOException - If an input or output exception occurs inside loadBoard or loadNotUsedPiece
